function_call.name: classify_mitigation
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_mitigations":[{"name":"Standardizing surveillance protocols, data analysis, and reporting mechanisms.","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Improve sanitation practices, educate the public about hygiene, and implement water treatment processes","category":"Maintenance / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Peer review and publication of comprehensive research data","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Implement strict data protection measures, obtain informed consent, and anonymize data","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Regular inspection and maintenance of plumbing systems, implementation of air purification systems, and adoption of antimicrobial materials.","category":"Maintenance / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implementation of wastewater monitoring and surveillance systems, development of rapid testing methods for wastewater, and public health education on environmental risks.","category":"Maintenance / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Enhanced sanitation and hygiene practices, public education on faecal-oral transmission risks, and development of targeted intervention strategies.","category":"Maintenance / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement timely waste collection protocols","category":"Greywater management","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Establish data sharing mechanisms without compromising privacy","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Improved ventilation, wastewater system maintenance, and enhanced building codes","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Strict waste management protocols and hygiene practices","category":"Greywater management","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Best management practices for waste handling and hygiene, separate collection services for infected households","category":"Greywater management","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Strict waste management protocols, disinfection of reusable personal protective equipment","category":"Greywater management","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement specific measures to improve ventilation, air quality, and hygiene in confined spaces","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Adopt strict infection control and hygiene standards for waste collection from affected households and facilities","category":"Greywater management","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Regular sanitization of frequently touched surfaces and objects","category":"Wall and floors treatment","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increase testing and monitoring of asymptomatic individuals, public health awareness campaigns","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implementation of social distancing, mask-wearing, and strict hygiene practices","category":"Social distancing","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Proper management and treatment of waste and wastewater","category":"Greywater management","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Research on virus transmission routes and building design modifications","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Education and training on virus characteristics and safe waste handling practices","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Support for revenue reduction and expense increase","category":"Absorb surge in service demande","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Regular maintenance, cleaning, and configuration checks of the ventilation system","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increase the amount of outdoor air and ensure constant air movement within the building","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Enforce and promote the use of masks, gloves, hand hygiene, surface cleaning, and physical distancing","category":"Ensure use of personal protection equipment","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Prevent overcrowding, provide good ventilation, and maintain ventilation systems correctly","category":"Occupancy control (eg separating at/risk contaminated population)","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use and maintain ventilation systems correctly, review and assess available research on ventilation and disease transmission","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implementing physical distancing measures, improving ventilation, and using air purifiers","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Clear communication and dissemination of evidence-based guidelines, ongoing research to provide more definitive conclusions","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Further research and evidence gathering, collaboration between public health agencies and research institutions to reach consensus","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Development of unified guidelines based on the most current evidence, stakeholder education and training on airborne transmission risks","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implementing recommended ventilation and filtration measures, maintaining optimal humidity levels, and using appropriate air cleaning devices.","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Bypassing energy recovery ventilation systems that have potential leaks and ensuring proper exhaust air management.","category":"Control airflows in spaces & Avoid air recirculation","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement ultraviolet germicidal irradiation uvgi and other disinfection technologies, follow ashrae guidelines for ventilation and filtration","category":"Disinfection of air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement ventilation and filtration systems as per ashrae guidelines, follow recommendations for controlling airborne exposure to viruses","category":"Disinfection of air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Regular maintenance and inspection of insulation, including removal of wet or contaminated insulation","category":"Wall and floors treatment","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Adherence to epa and nadca guidelines for the use of sealants, application only on clean and dry duct surfaces","category":"Wall and floors treatment","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of appropriate cleaning protocols, protective barriers, and equipment","category":"Wall and floors treatment","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Regular feedback collection from occupants, prompt follow-up on reported feelings of illness","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Adherence to ansi/ashrae standard 180-2018 and nadca acr 2013 standards, use of certified cleaning firms","category":"Wall and floors treatment","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Verification of required licenses for air duct cleaners, compliance with state regulations","category":"Wall and floors treatment","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Establish and adhere to a strict schedule for the regular cleaning and maintenance of hvac systems, including filter changes and thorough cleaning of components.","category":"Wall and floors treatment","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Provide proper training and equipment for safe filter replacement, including gloves, respirators, masks, and disposal procedures for dirty filters.","category":"Wall and floors treatment","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Conduct regular inspections and maintenance of hvac systems to prevent or identify reentrainment issues. implement engineering changes if necessary to mitigate reentrainment risks.","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Regular inspection and maintenance of ventilation systems, proper air flow management, and use of high-efficiency filters.","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Prompt investigation and remediation of odor sources, regular cleaning and inspection of building interiors, and proper management of waste and moisture.","category":"Wall and floors treatment","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Regular cleaning and maintenance of ventilation systems, use of high-efficiency filters, and proper disposal of collected contaminants.","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Regular maintenance and cleaning of hvac system, proper operation checks, and filter replacement","category":"Wall and floors treatment","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Regular checks to ensure the system fan is set to ’on’ or ’circulate’ when occupants are present, proper air grille maintenance","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Set and maintain indoor temperature range within recommended limits, use of smart thermostats and temperature control systems","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"Medium"}]}
